sentences.en: He was elegantly dressed in a grey suit, blue shirt, and paisley tie.
sentences.cn: 他优雅地穿着一件灰色西服，蓝衬衣，系着佩斯利涡旋花纹领带。

sentences.en: Mr Jobs, who died this week aged 56, spent his life packaging that magic into elegantly designed, easy-to-use products.
sentences.cn: 乔布斯先生于本周去世，享年56岁。他一生都致力于将其魔法包裹进设计优雅、易于使用的产品中。
